title: !!! IMPORTANT: Your Canvas Submissions
content: We just found out about one issue regarding of submitting on Canvas. The problem is you can only submit either a file OR a text which not what we intended to.

title: Requesting MySQL credentials
content: I apologize for the inconvenience, but f you have not yet received your MySQL credentials please request an account here: https://newtraell.cs.uchicago.edu/info/services/account_request
